snippet: The company had previously said it would close its factory in Bochum in 2014, but the new agreement with workers could stave off labor action against the move.
abstract: Opel unit of General Motors says it reaches preliminary agreement with workers to close factory in Bochum, Germany, at end of 2014; new agreement could stave off labor action against move.
lead_paragraph: The company had previously said it would close its factory in Bochum in 2014, but the new agreement with workers could stave off labor action against the move.

headline.main: G.M.’s Opel Unit Reaches Deal to Close a German Plant
headline.print_headline: G.M.’s Opel Unit Reaches Deal to Close a German Plant
